thread.title: Jackie Moore
thread.title_full: Lifestyle Furniture reviewed by Jackie Moore

author: Jackie Moore
title: Jackie Moore
text: I had searched a long time for a special tv unit and just by chance found lifestyle furniture ...I already have a book case ,table and two units .The peice of furniture I have just purchased is stunning .So many complements ..Takes pride of place in our living room .
